Welcome to the Intelligent Mobile Device Lab at KSU

The IMDL @ KSU is aimed at making transportation safer through wireless communications and computer networking. Our aim is to explore and improve Intelligent Transportation Systems through experimental research and software development to develop new sensing and mobile computing approaches using machine learning / artificial intelligence throughout the network fabric.

Previous Next

Something here (see Research).

We are located in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at Kennesaw State University, in the Southern Polytechnic College of Engineering and Engineering Technology We are grateful for grants from Office of Undergraduate Research, OUR and our sponsors.
